3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Esa bin Talhah said:"I heard Mu'awiyah bin Abu Sufyan say that Messenger of Allah said: "The Mu'adh-dhin will have the longest necks of all people on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Adhan And The Reward Of The Mu'adh-dhin
